screen.actualmultiplehotbars.ui.title: Additional Hotbars
text.autoconfig.actualmultiplehotbars.op: Additional Hotbars
Allow Filling Additional Hotbar
Prefer Additional Hotbars Over Main
If enabled items which are picked up will first go into additional hotbars
before filling up the currently equipped hotbar
If enabled items which are picked up are allowed to fill existing stacks
before filling up the main inventory/hotbar depending on the above preference
Allow Filling Empty Additional Hotbar Slots
If enabled items which are picked up are allowed to go into
empty hotbar slots depending on the preference settings above
Vertical Position
Hotbar Provider
The inventory system to use for the extra hotbars.
Additional Hotbars Visible
Allow Rotation Into Invisible Hotbars
When enabled any hotbar which isn't currently displayed can be rotated into
using the 'Rotate hotbars' hotkey
Reverse Hotbar Order
This keeps the active hotbar on top, as opposed to the bottom as in default MC
Allow Mouse Scroll Swap
When the hotbar cursor will wrap around when scrolling with the mouse the next/previous hotbar will be automatically equipped
Swap Single Bar Modifier Key
When this modifier key is pressed alongside '1', '2', '3', etc
then the corresponding hotbar is directly swapped with the currently equiped hotbar
Swap and Equip Inactive Hotbar Modifier key
When this modifier key is pressed alongside '1', '2', '3', etc
then the secondary hotbar is equipped and the slot corresponding to the number key is selected
text.actualmultiplehotbars.unsupported: [MHF] This server doesn't support additional hotbar inventories, forcing player inventories
